segment.source: How to Start, Stop, and Restart a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Start, Stop, and Restart a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: How to Start, Stop, and Restart a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Start, Stop, and Restart a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: How to Start, Stop, and Restart a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Start, Stop, and Restart a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: To start a MED-V workspace
segment.target: To start a MED-V workspace

segment.source: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.
segment.target: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.

segment.source: On the submenu, click Start Workspace.
segment.target: On the submenu, click Start Workspace.

segment.source: If there are multiple MED-V workspaces running on the computer, the Workspace Selection window appears.
segment.target: If there are multiple MED-V workspaces running on the computer, the Workspace Selection window appears.

segment.source: Select a MED-V workspace.
segment.target: Select a MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Select the Start the selected Workspace without asking me check box to skip this window the next time the client is started and to automatically open the selected MED-V workspace.
segment.target: Select the Start the selected Workspace without asking me check box to skip this window the next time the client is started and to automatically open the selected MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: The Start Workspace Authentication window appears.
segment.target: The Start Workspace Authentication window appears.

segment.source: If there are several MED-V workspaces on the computer and you have opted to use a specified MED-V workspace, the window shown in the following figure appears.
segment.target: If there are several MED-V workspaces on the computer and you have opted to use a specified MED-V workspace, the window shown in the following figure appears.

segment.source: If there is only one MED-V workspace on the computer, the “Start last used Workspace” option is unavailable.
segment.target: If there is only one MED-V workspace on the computer, the “Start last used Workspace” option is unavailable.

segment.source: Type in your domain user credentials.
segment.target: Type in your domain user credentials.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The first time a MED-V workspace is started, the user name should be in the following format: domain nameuser name.
segment.target: The first time a MED-V workspace is started, the user name should be in the following format: domain nameuser name.

segment.source: Select Save my password to save your password between sessions.
segment.target: Select Save my password to save your password between sessions.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: To enable the save password feature, the EnableSavePassword attribute must be set to True in the ClientSettings.xml file.
segment.target: To enable the save password feature, the EnableSavePassword attribute must be set to True in the ClientSettings.xml file.

segment.source: The file can be found in the ServersConfiguration Server folder.
segment.target: The file can be found in the ServersConfiguration Server folder.

segment.source: Clear the Start last used workspace check box to choose a different MED-V workspace.
segment.target: Clear the Start last used workspace check box to choose a different MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: Several status screens appear depending on the MED-V workspace configuration.
segment.target: Several status screens appear depending on the MED-V workspace configuration.

segment.source: The Starting Workspace screen appears.
segment.target: The Starting Workspace screen appears.

segment.source: To restart a MED-V workspace
segment.target: To restart a MED-V workspace

segment.source: When the client is running, in the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.
segment.target: When the client is running, in the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.

segment.source: On the submenu, click Restart Workspace.
segment.target: On the submenu, click Restart Workspace.

segment.source: The MED-V workspace is restarted.
segment.target: The MED-V workspace is restarted.

segment.source: In a persistent MED-V workspace, the virtual machine is shut down and then restarted.
segment.target: In a persistent MED-V workspace, the virtual machine is shut down and then restarted.

segment.source: In a revertible MED-V workspace, the virtual machine does not actually shut down; instead, it returns to its original state.
segment.target: In a revertible MED-V workspace, the virtual machine does not actually shut down; instead, it returns to its original state.

segment.source: To stop a MED-V workspace
segment.target: To stop a MED-V workspace

segment.source: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.
segment.target: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.

segment.source: On the submenu, click Stop Workspace.
segment.target: On the submenu, click Stop Workspace.

segment.source: The MED-V workspace is stopped.
segment.target: The MED-V workspace is stopped.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: How to Start and Exit the MED-V Client
